content:
OCPN 5.8 is using wxWidgets 3.2.4 on MacOS and other platforms. 3.2.6 is available and has fixes for a couple of bugs I am seeing. Can the next release of OCPN use at least 3.2.6, please?
I read that there are only internal fixes and no changes to calls. If I understand it correctly, if OCPN moves to 3.2.6, plugins would benefit without having to be rebuilt.
